headline: Will GoDaddy’s (GDDY) AI Tools and Buybacks Reshape Its Long-Term Business Narrative?
summary: In recent months, GoDaddy has continued shifting beyond its traditional domain registration roots toward higher-margin software, AI-enabled tools, and broader small-business services, while also returning capital to shareholders through an authorized US$900 million share repurchase program. This combination of expanding software and AI capabilities, such as Airo.ai and enhanced WordPress features, and active buybacks is reshaping how investors assess GoDaddy’s long-term business mix and...
